mapper.insert: insert into user values (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userTel},#{userAddress}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirth}, '1', null, 'y', CURDATE(), null, '1', null)
mapper.update: update user set user_preference = #{prefer} where user_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select user_preference from user where user_id=#{id}
